author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Remove legacy CUDA pixel track and vertex reconstruction:
  - remove legacy CUDA pixel track modules and data formats;
  - remove legacy CUDA pixel vertex modules and data formats;
  - remove legacy CUDA SoA-based L2TauTagNNProducer.

#### PR validation:

All unit and matrix tests pass.
title: Remove legacy CUDA pixel track and vertex reconstruction
